segment.source: Troubleshoot email profiles in Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Troubleshoot email profiles in Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Troubleshoot email profiles in Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Troubleshoot email profiles in Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Listed here are some email profile issues and how to troubleshoot and resolve them..
segment.target: Listed here are some email profile issues and how to troubleshoot and resolve them..

segment.source: Unable to send images from email account
segment.target: Unable to send images from email account

segment.source: Users who have email accounts automatically configured are unable to send pictures or images from their devices.
segment.target: Users who have email accounts automatically configured are unable to send pictures or images from their devices.

segment.source: This occurs when the option Allow e-mail to be sent from third-party applications is not enabled.
segment.target: This occurs when the option Allow e-mail to be sent from third-party applications is not enabled.

segment.source: Open the Microsoft Intune Administration Console, select Policy workload > Configuration Policy.
segment.target: Open the Microsoft Intune Administration Console, select Policy workload > Configuration Policy.

segment.source: Select the email profile and click Edit.
segment.target: Select the email profile and click Edit.

segment.source: Select Allow e-mail to be sent from third-party applications.
segment.target: Select Allow e-mail to be sent from third-party applications.

segment.source: Configuration Manager integrated with Intune solution
segment.target: Configuration Manager integrated with Intune solution

segment.source: Open the Configuration Manager console > Assets and Compliance.
segment.target: Open the Configuration Manager console > Assets and Compliance.

segment.source: Expand Overview -> Compliance Settings -> Company Resource Access, and select Email Profiles.
segment.target: Expand Overview -> Compliance Settings -> Company Resource Access, and select Email Profiles.

segment.source: Right-click the e-mail profile, and open Properties.
segment.target: Right-click the e-mail profile, and open Properties.

segment.source: On the Synchronization Settings tab, select Allow e-mail to be sent from third-party applications.
segment.target: On the Synchronization Settings tab, select Allow e-mail to be sent from third-party applications.
